text: when i say radical you say monarchs
radical
radical monarchs the radical monarchs
are an organization where we focus on
young girls of color
through radical monarchs we form a
sisterhood where
we can have a safe space to talk about
social justice issues
how we can take actions creating social
change
hi my name is lupita i'm 16 years old
i'm a junior in high school
and i'm an alumni in the radical
monarchs my name is namik sulu i'm skadu
and we are also
radical monarch alumni the difference
between being an alumni
and being in a troupe is we have more of
a responsibility to be a role model to
the younger monarchs
and the radical monarchs troop at the
end of learning about an issue
we earn a badge we have the pasha mama
justice badge radical bodies badge
black lives matter badge we've been
talking about the black lives matter
movement i felt a lot of sadness and a
lot of anger
because black lives matter has been
happening for years i think it's
important for people to go to marches
because we're showing we're together as
a group and we want to change
[Music]
i'd say being an ally is saying we're
here for you and
what can we do to help support you
because i'm latina
i do face some racism at school have
conversations with people who may not
agree with you
get the other perspective of the person
and try to understand where they're
coming from
it's important for young girls to have a
voice because
if we all have a voice we're stronger
together es importante
los artos
